scripts.start:debug: npm run _cmake:build:debug && BUILD_TYPE=Debug concurrently -n vite,cpp -c cyan,magenta "vite" "npm run _cpp:watch:debug"
scripts.start:release: npm run _cmake:build:release && BUILD_TYPE=Release concurrently -n vite,cpp -c cyan,magenta "vite" "npm run _cpp:watch:release"
scripts.start:relwithdebinfo: npm run _cmake:build:relwithdebinfo && BUILD_TYPE=RelWithDebInfo concurrently -n vite,cpp -c cyan,magenta "vite" "npm run _cpp:watch:relwithdebinfo"
scripts.start:minsizerel: npm run _cmake:build:minsizerel && BUILD_TYPE=MinSizeRel concurrently -n vite,cpp -c cyan,magenta "vite" "npm run _cpp:watch:minsizerel"
scripts.build:debug: npm run _cmake:build:debug && tsc && BUILD_TYPE=Debug vite build
scripts.build:release: npm run _cmake:build:release && tsc && BUILD_TYPE=Release vite build
scripts._cmake:configure: cd ../../.. && cmake --preset targ-emscripten-Debug && cmake --preset targ-emscripten-Release && cmake --preset targ-emscripten-RelWithDebInfo && cmake --preset targ-emscripten-MinSizeRel
